value:
$WmMPID_カゲロウ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|You made a big promise. But do
you know what to steal to impress
Cath?$k$pNina, tell me you have an idea...$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Well...$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|That's a look I've never seen on
your face. You ARE taking this
seriously, I see...$k$pHm? What's this?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗リカード,ch01_51_Ricard_M_Thief22,Face|I see how it is. You're not a thief by
trade, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗サザ,ch11_02_Sothe_M_Thief22,Face|No. There was a time when I had no
choice but to steal, just to survive...
But it's not my profession.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗リカード,ch01_51_Ricard_M_Thief22,Face|Could have fooled me. You know the
craft. I was sure you were one of us...$k$pThat said, we aren't so different, are
we, new friend?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗サザ,ch11_02_Sothe_M_Thief22,Face|We'll see.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|What a sight! Oh, my mind is
absolutely tingling at the possibilities!$k$pEr... Did you say something, Kagero?$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|Nothing important. But while I have
your attention, what do you plan to
do regarding this competition?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Er...$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|...$k$p$Sbs150|
